MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn,  affecting properties in Greendykes Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.54am. Our engineers have arrived on site at Greendyke Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.48am on 6th April 2021.
